quotes.message: Most of the important things in the world have been accomplished by people who have kept on trying when there seemed to be no hope at all.
quotes.name: Dale Carnegie

quotes.message: The toughest thing about success is that you've got to keep on being a success. Talent is only a starting point in this business. You've got to keep on working that talent. Someday I'll reach for it and it won't be there.
quotes.name: Irving Berlin

quotes.message: When you have got an elephant by the hind leg, and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run.
quotes.name: Abraham Lincoln
